revised_title: Discovery of a Water Insect Capable of Regenerating into Multiple Perfect Animals
tldr: A water insect was discovered that could regenerate into multiple perfect animals when cut into pieces. This surprising property was examined and confirmed by professors Albinus and Mussenbrock. The insect was also mentioned in a letter from Monsieur Buffon, who shared two other singular observations in natural history. The full potential and mechanisms of this regeneration are yet to be explored.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Invertebrate Zoology
